title: Galaxy S22 and Tab S8 series pre-orders “more than doubled” over previous generations
content:
Samsung officially revealed the Galaxy S22 series and Galaxy Tab S8 series earlier this month, with all the products set to officially be released on February 25. Pre-orders have been live since the announcement event on February 9, and now Samsung is sharing some details on the first wave of purchases. Pre-orders for the Galaxy

The post Galaxy S22 and Tab S8 series pre-orders “more than doubled” over previous generations appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung revealed today that pre-orders for the Galaxy S22 and Tab S8 "more than doubled" pre-orders for the Galaxy S21 and Tab S7 series.
